message: Hi Bob, I'm offering a 60-40 split in my favor. This is fair considering that you face 10% inflation each round while I don't. If we delay too long, the money will be worth much less to you, so accepting now maximizes your actual value.
Alice, I understand your advantage, but I think a 55-45 split in your favor is more reasonable given the inflation risk I'm taking. Let's settle for this to avoid further devaluation of my share.
